Description: Rim sherd from a colourless buff-tinged glass convex bowl with vertical facets and four horizontal bands on the exterior.
Bibliographic references: Glass / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass in the British Museum (633)
Glass 2 / Catalogue of Greek and Roman Glass, Volume 2 (577)
Howells 2015 / A Catalogue of the Late Antique Gold Glass in the British Museum (p.21)
